content: Net sales of our wholesale operations segment increased approximately 47% to $719 million from $488 million last year, and was up 13% to pre-pandemic levels of $635 million in fiscal year 2020. Net income for the fourth quarter was $48 million or $0.98 per diluted share compared to $15 million or $0.30 per diluted share in last year's fourth quarter and included direct losses from Wilsons and Bass store operations of $9 million, or $0.17 per share.
